title: Multi-Jet Merging in Deep Inelastic Scattering with Pythia
authors: Joni Laulainen, Ilkka Helenius, Christian T. Preuss
abstract:
We aim to improve the modelling of deep inelastic scattering by implementing
multi-jet merging capabilities in Vincia parton shower in the general-purpose
Monte Carlo event generator, Pythia. Merging allows to combine event samples of
different parton multiplicities with logarithmically enhanced radiation from
parton shower algorithms, without double-counting. Here we consider events up
to five outgoing partons and present results for jet analyses compared to
experimental data provided by the ZEUS and H1 collaborations of the HERA
collider. The analyses span a wide range in photon virtuality, and the results
show that the multi-jet merging improves jet modelling especially for low
virtuality events.
